**Lorenz Interpolation: A Method for Estimating Income Inequality from Grouped Income Data**  
  Carr, A. (2022).  
  This study introduces a new statistical method to estimate income inequality using grouped data.  
  *Sociological Methodology*. [Read article](https://doi.org/10.1177/00811750221085586)


**Greater New Haven Community Wellbeing Index 2023**  
  Abraham, M., Seaberry, C., Davila, K., & Carr, A. (2023).<br>
  A comprehensive report on the wellbeing of residents in Greater New Haven, covering health, economic opportunity, and community resources. [Read report](https://www.ctdatahaven.org)
